item.title: 2 mattresses abandoned by our garden gate, 12th December
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping, 12th December
item.description:
Gas cylinders have been dumped/car has been emptied as per photo several boxes of used canisters. People often dump rubbish from their vehicles on this stretch of road, slightly out of sight from residential properties but not usually to this extent.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Way, West Wickham, Greater London
